import React, {useMemo, useState} from "react"; import styles from './details-ingredient.module.css' import {data} from "../../../../utils/data"; const DetailsIngredient = () => { return ( <>
    {data.filter(data => (

  • {data.name}

    • Калории, ккал

      {data.calories}

    • Белки, г

      {data.proteins}

    • Жиры, г

      {data.fat}

    • Углеводы, г

      {data.carbohydrates}
    • ))}
) } export default DetailsIngredient;
